metadata.feature_description: Browse through paginated list of user's recent activities with details about area, action, and timestamp

steps.expected: Users panel opens with list of users
steps.actual: Users panel opened successfully showing 20 users with pagination (10 users per page)

steps.action: Click on User Activity icon for a user (Claude TestUser)
steps.expected: User activity details panel expands showing recent activities
steps.actual: Activity panel expanded showing Last Active, Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence, Total Contributions, and Recent Activity section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify relative date formatting for activities

steps.action: View activity for newly created user (EmptyTest User)
steps.expected: Activity timestamp shows relative date format
steps.actual: Activity shows 'Joined Site moments ago' - relative date formatting working correctly

steps.expected: Activity timestamp shows relative date format
steps.actual: Activity shows 'Joined Site 1 week ago' - relative date formatting working correctly

steps.expected: Activity timestamp shows relative date format
steps.actual: Activity shows 'Joined Site 2 weeks ago' - relative date formatting working correctly

steps.action: View Recent Activity section for multiple users
steps.expected: Activity shows area information (e.g., library name)
steps.actual: All activities show 'EVOQ CONTENT LIBRARY' as the area, correctly displaying the activity context

steps.action: Click User Activity for Claude TestUser, then click User Activity for Test User123
steps.expected: Activity panel refreshes with the selected user's activities
steps.actual: Activity panel correctly refreshed showing different user data (different Rank, Reputation, Experience values and activity timestamps)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to next page of activities

steps.action: Attempt to find user with more than 10 activities to test pagination
steps.expected: Find a user with >10 activities to enable pagination controls
steps.actual: All users in the test environment have only 1 activity (Joined Site). Pagination controls do not appear because no user has more than 10 activities. Code review confirms Pager component is configured with pageSize=10 and would display pagination when totalRecords > pageSize.

issues: Cannot test pagination navigation - no user in test environment has more than 10 activities. All users only have the automatic 'Joined Site' activity created on registration.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to previous page of activities

steps.action: Attempt to test previous page navigation
steps.expected: Navigate to page 2 first, then click previous to return to page 1
steps.actual: Cannot test - same limitation as next page test. No user has enough activities to enable pagination.

issues: Cannot test previous page navigation - insufficient activity data in test environment

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify page size fixed at 10 items

steps.action: Verify that page displays maximum 10 activities at a time
steps.expected: Recent Activities section shows 10 items per page
steps.actual: Cannot verify through UI - all users have only 1 activity. Code review confirms pageSize is hardcoded to 10 in RecentActivities component (line 69: pageSize={10}).

issues: Cannot verify page size visually - requires user with >10 activities. Code confirms pageSize=10 is correctly configured.

steps.action: Check for total activities count in pager summary
steps.expected: Pager shows summary text with total activities count
steps.actual: Cannot verify - pager summary only appears when there are multiple pages. Code shows summaryText is configured using RecentActivityPagingSummaryText localization key.

issues: Cannot verify total count display - requires pagination to be active

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty activities list (No recent activities message)

steps.action: Create a new user and check their activities immediately
steps.expected: New user should show 'No recent activities' message before any activity
steps.actual: Newly created user 'EmptyTest User' immediately shows 'Joined Site moments ago' activity. The 'Joined Site' activity is automatically created during user creation, not on first login. Code shows empty state message 'No recent activities' exists (line 75 of index.jsx) but cannot be triggered through normal user creation.

issues: Cannot test empty activities state - 'Joined Site' activity is automatically created on user creation, preventing the empty state from being achieved through normal testing

observations: Code review confirms RecentActivities component uses Pager with pageSize=10 and showSummary=true
The component correctly handles empty state with 'No recent activities' message, but this state cannot be reached through normal user creation
Relative date formatting is implemented via Utilities.RelativeDateFromUtcDate() and works correctly (moments ago, 1 week ago, 2 weeks ago, etc.)
Activity title HTML stripping is implemented via Utilities.RemoveHtmlTags() in UserActivityDto.cs
Activity title truncation with ellipsis is implemented via Utilities.TrimWithEllipsis() in UserActivityDto.cs
The 'Joined Site' activity is the only activity type observed in the test environment, suggesting limited activity data for comprehensive pagination testing
API endpoint GetUserRecentActivities accepts userId, pageIndex, and pageSize parameters and is correctly configured
